title: MD
biography: Ratha Kanneer is a 1954 Indian Tamil-language drama film directed by Krishnan–Panju, and written by Tiruvarur K. Thangaraj. Based on Thangaraj's play of the same name, the film stars M. R. Radha, Sriranjani and S. S. Rajendran, with Chandrababu, M. N. Rajam and S. R. Janaki in supporting roles. It revolves around a returned-from-abroad, westernised rich man who shows arrogance and contempt towards anything part of Indian culture and anyone below his social standards.
aiSummary: K. Thangaraj is a medicine specialist with an H-index of 52 at CCMBPopulation genetics (Member). Has been published in Nature, Science, Nature Genetics. Based in Unknown, Unknown, Global.
